REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0968 reute d f BC-MARKITSTAR-<MARK>-NAM 03-12 0039

TEXT.TITLE: MARKITSTAR <MARK> NAMES SALES REPRESENTATIVE
TEXT.BODY: MarkitStar Inc said it has signed an agreement for Orimedia of Paris to become a sales representative for MarkitStar products and services in the European Community. Reuter
